get.description: Retrieves all of the customer group limit exposures

parameters.name: liabilityNumber
parameters.description: Identifier of the Liability Customer to the credit limit

parameters.name: limitProduct
parameters.description: Identifier of the credit limit product

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: A sequence reference for the limit, which when used together with other fields such as Liability Number and/or Limit Reference, provides a unique identifier for a credit line

parameters.name: limitCurrency
parameters.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

parameters.name: expiryDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

parameters.name: outstandingAmount
parameters.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

parameters.name: availableAmount
parameters.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

parameters.name: availableOrExcess
parameters.description: The available amount for the corresponding liability number and limit reference. This amount is always expressed in the currency of the limit. Calculated as the sum of the online limit, the available balance and any sub allocation taken, less any sub allocation given, any commission available, the total outstanding.

parameters.name: requestedCurrency
parameters.description: The currency the amount is requested in.

parameters.name: exchangeRate
parameters.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

parameters.name: limitType
parameters.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

parameters.name: repaidAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the amount which was repaid from the customer

parameters.name: isAggregationExists
parameters.description: Indicates if there exists aggregation of one or many customer exposure under a primary customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.
